channel.title: Time Zone on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Time Zone on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North - Entering Hughes County/Central Time Zone
item.description: Entering Hughes County/Central Time Zone on US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North. The county/time zone boundary is on the Missouri River bridge.

item.title: NV-487 North - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada / Pacific Time Zone on NV-487 North.

item.title: I-80 West - Pacific Time Zone
item.description: Entering Pacific Time Zone on I-80 West/Alt. US-93 North. The city of West Wendover, Nevada observes Mountain Time as it is located on the Utah border. The time zone boundary on I-80 is just west of West Wendover.

item.title: I-11 North - Distance Marker / Pacific Time
item.description: First distance marker on I-11 north in Nevada. Distance to Henderson and Las Vegas. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: NV-225 North - Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on NV-225 north, approaching the Idaho state line. The official time zone boundary is the Nevada-Idaho state line, but the towns of Owyhee and Mountain City, NV both observe Mountain Time.

item.title: US-6/US-50 West - Pacific Time Zone
item.description: Entering Pacific Time Zone at the Nevada-Utah state line on US-6/US-50 west.

item.title: US-26 East - Malheur County / Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Malheur County / Mountain Time Zone on US-26 east. Most of Oregon is in Pacific Time, except for the northern half of Malheur County and some communities in Hells Canyon.

item.title: NV-225 North - Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on NV-225 north, approaching the Idaho state line. The official time zone boundary is the Nevada-Idaho state line, but the towns of Owyhee and Mountain City, NV both observe Mountain Time.

item.title: US-87 South - Central Time Zone
item.description: Central Time Zone on US-87 south. Taken at the New Mexico - Texas state line.

item.title: I-10 West - Hudspeth County/Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Hudspeth County and Mountain Time Zone on I-10 west.

item.title: RM-652 - Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on RM-652 west.

item.title: OR-78 East - Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on OR-78 east.

item.title: I-40 West - Entering Pacific Time
item.description: Entering Pacific Time on I-40 west. Arizona does not observe daylight savings time, so during the summer months Arizona and California are on the same time.

item.title: I-80 East - Entering Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on I-80 east, just before the Nevada-Utah state line.

item.title: US-93 South - Pacific Time
item.description: Entering Pacific Time on US-93 south. Almost all of Nevada is on Pacific Time, except for a few of the border towns, Jackpot included.

item.title: US-95 North - Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on US-95 north. US-95 passes in and out of Mountain Time for its duration. The highway enters Pacific Time again just north of Riggins, Idaho.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on I-10 West/US-95 north, just west of the California State Agricultural Inspection Station. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: US-12 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-12 west at Lolo Pass. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: US-30 East - Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Mountain Time - Set Your Watch Ahead One Hour, on US-30 east.

item.title: I-8 West - Welcome To California
item.description: I-8 west at Welcome To California/Entering Pacific Time Zone just west of Arizona line.

item.title: US-95 North - Mountain Time Zone/Salmon River
item.description: Mountain Time Zone at Salmon River on US-95 South

item.title: MT-200 East - Mountain Standard Time Zone
item.description: Mountain Time Zone at ID-MT Border on MT-200 East
